Barometer.name: Barometer
Barometer.description: This IPSO object should be used with an air pressure sensor to report a barometer measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the barometer sensor. An example measurement unit is pascals.

Sensor_Value.name: Sensor Value
Sensor_Value.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

Min_Measured_Value.name: Min Measured Value
Min_Measured_Value.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Max_Measured_Value.name: Max Measured Value
Max_Measured_Value.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Min_Range_Value.name: Min Range Value
Min_Range_Value.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

Max_Range_Value.name: Max Range Value
Max_Range_Value.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

Reset_Min_and_Max_Measured_Values.name: Reset Min and Max Measured Values
Reset_Min_and_Max_Measured_Values.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value
